description: Monitor for changes made to command history files, such as ConsoleHost_history.txt, ~/.zsh_history, or ~/.bash_history, for unexpected modifications to contents, access permissions, and attributes. Analytic 1 : Modification of access rights to command history files (source="*WinEventLog:Security" EventCode IN (4663, 4670) AND Path="*ConsoleHost_history.txt*" AND ObjectType="File") AND (UserAccessList="*1539*" OR UserAccessList="*WRITE_DAC*") OR (ObjectNewSd="*;FA*" OR ObjectNewSd="*;FW*" OR ObjectNewSd="*;BU*")
